BIRDBOT / PAPERTRON





(Birdbot and Papertron come up behind Trinity hear=
ing what she said.)



Papertron: Well, I hope someone eats you up for dinn=
er! Erf fer fer fer! And spiders are beautiful! I know it because one almos=
t ate me for lunch. I think your the ugly one. HEH!! HEH!!!....



(Birdbot=
 was staring at Trinity. His eyes changing from red to orange. He started t=
o duck down while staring at her...)

 do you know why? did that 
  spider make that I hated Maximals? Before I m=
et that spider I didn't 
  hate maximal, my mom and dad were maximals, did =
the spider do that? 
  uh? "
